mercedes-benz.com.exec_title: Chairman of the Board of Management & CEO
mercedes-benz.com.exec_quote: With MB.OS, a Mercedes will actually improve with age. Regarding software, we have entered the era of software-defined cars with MB.OS.
mercedes-benz.com.displacement_angle: SAP/Solr cannot handle real-time inventory across 6,000+ dealer locations with configurator integration

nab.com.au.exec_quote: Digital, data and AI are critical enablers for the delivery of our strategic ambition of customer-centricity. AI will continue to transform the way we work and how well and fast we do it.
nab.com.au.displacement_angle: LucidWorks requires dedicated search engineering team; Algolia offers API-first simplicity for banking app

huawei.com.exec_quote: The key challenge lies in whether telcos can engineer user-centric digital transformation offering users a ROADS experience (Real-time, On-demand, All-online, Do-it-yourself, and Social).
huawei.com.displacement_angle: Strategic self-sufficiency due to US sanctions; uses internal Huawei Cloud CSS

spglobal.com.exec_quote: 2025 was truly a leap forward for AI, with new AI products and features launched in every division. Our customers need our leading benchmarks, differentiated data, and workflows.
spglobal.com.displacement_angle: Financial data platform with massive search volume; SparkAIR shows appetite for AI search

bms.com.exec_quote: Advances in technology, like AI and machine learning, can increase the pace of innovation even more dramatically. It's exciting to think what the future could hold.
bms.com.displacement_angle: Elasticsearch self-managed; pharma portal search with complex medical terminology needs

marks.com.exec_title: President and CEO, Canadian Tire Corporation
marks.com.exec_quote: Our ongoing True North strategy is a modernization agenda. MOSaiC will help our teams make better decisions about what to offer, when, and where, by connecting Triangle Rewards insights and local context at scale.
marks.com.displacement_angle: BloomReach displacement; AI search initiative shows tech appetite; e-commerce growing 2x brick-and-mortar

caremark.com.exec_quote: Health care today is fragmented and difficult to navigate. Our focus is on creating a simpler, more connected experience, and technology is central to that effort.
caremark.com.displacement_angle: Healthcare portal search with pharmacy/benefits discovery; HIPAA-compliant search needed

infinitiusa.com.exec_quote: How can we delight them? How can we make them say, 'Wow, I can't even think about another brand because they're taking so much care of me.'
infinitiusa.com.displacement_angle: LucidWorks displacement; luxury auto configurator and dealer search needs

fiat.com.exec_quote: The reset we have announced today is part of the decisive process to once again make our customers and their preferences our guiding star.
fiat.com.displacement_angle: Multi-brand auto group (14 brands); configurator standardization opportunity

johnlewis.com.exec_quote: We know our transformation is ongoing and there's a lot more to do, but with two incredible brands that have clear headroom for growth, we are confident our strategy is the right one.
johnlewis.com.displacement_angle: Self-managed Elasticsearch since 2018; engineering burden could be compelling displacement story

moodys.com.exec_quote: For over a century, our customers have looked to Moody's for premium data, trusted insights, and cutting-edge solutions. AI is supercharging the speed and precision at which we can help our customers understand risk.
moodys.com.quote_source: Moody's Agentic Solutions Press Release Feb 2026
moodys.com.displacement_angle: 590M entity database with agentic AI search; enterprise data discovery opportunity

juniper.net.exec_title: President & GM, HPE Networking (formerly CEO, Juniper)
juniper.net.exec_quote: HPE and Juniper have a unique opportunity to disrupt the networking industry. Together, we'll provide customers with a secure network that is purpose-built with AI and for AI.
juniper.net.displacement_angle: Elasticsearch self-managed; tech documentation and support portal search

f5.com.exec_quote: AI is accelerating innovation, but also intensifying the high costs, crushing complexity, and escalating cyber risks. F5 stands alone in its ability to address the challenges of hybrid multicloud architectures.
f5.com.displacement_angle: Coveo displacement; tech documentation and support knowledge base search

allianz.fr.exec_title: Chairman of the Board of Management (CEO)
allianz.fr.exec_quote: We launched efforts under our Heritage and Renewal program, many revolving around digitizing our business to provide the best service possible to our customers. A service that meets them where they are, whenever they want.
allianz.fr.displacement_angle: Insurance product catalog and agent portal search; multi-country standardization opportunity

bever.nl.exec_quote: We want to offer our customers more options and freedom in how they engage with our products. Retailers shouldn't try to copy platforms — instead focus on things that make you special.
bever.nl.displacement_angle: Dutch outdoor retailer; product discovery with rental/circular model needs faceted search

gap.com.exec_quote: We are transforming Gap Inc. with a focus on relevance, culture, and customer connection. Digital innovation is central to meeting customers where they are.
gap.com.displacement_angle: SFCC native search has limited NLP; multi-brand portfolio (Gap, Old Navy, Banana Republic, Athleta)
gap.com.competitors_using_algolia: Under Armour (+35% conversions), Lacoste (2x sales), Gymshark
